name: simple flower halo
description:
This is a new halo in the shop! I love the soft beige/sand coloring of this halo. The tieback has been embellished with 2 sweet simple flowers and a bead. It's very easy to use. What makes the tiebacks so great is that it fits lots of head sizes.

Thanks for looking!

name: Cabled
description:
The simplest of beanies can be made extra special with a cable stitch. The cable gives it that little something extra.

This hat was knitted with a nice sand/ oatmeal colored yarn. The yarn can take on a grayish tint in some lights.
I can make this hat in other colors (cream, brown, gray, charcoal)

Size: Newborn for very new babies (13-14 inches around)

Care: Hand wash only, lay flat to dry.

Thanks for looking!

Product Photography by Becky Hill with 
www.capturedwithcarphotography.com

name: Baby Bear Cub with detachable bow
description:
Your baby will be the talk of the town in this little beanie. What is so great about this hat is that the bow is detachable. The bow is actually pink. It's hard to tell from the picture. This hat is ivory in color, which makes it great for a baby girl or baby boy These hats are going fast. Grab yours now! 

Size: Newborn (13"-14")

Thanks for looking!

name: Stripes Bonnet
description:
This is new to the shop. Thought it would be cute to add navy stripes to this gray hat. Perfect for baby boy!

Size: Newborn

Care: Hand wash, lay flat to dry.

name: Chevron Baby
description:
This is another new one in the shop! This little bonnet is shades of beige and ivory. With these neutral shades, it's a perfect bonnet for newborn girls or boys. 

Size: Newborn

Care: hand wash in cold, lay flat to dry.

Let me know if you have any questions. Thanks for stopping in!

name: All Tied Up
description:
So thrilled for this new little number in the shop. This little bonnet is actually striped. It's striped with an ecru/cream type color and a brown. The brown is the color of the bow shown in the picture. The yarn used for this hat is a soft mohair type yarn. This is one of my favorite yarns.  It's so soft and delicate!
I should have a picture of the bonnet by itself up soon.
 
Size: Newborn

Thanks for looking!

name: NEW Something Purple
description:
This is a new little bonnet in the shop. It is sweet and simple. It was made using a pretty wool roving yarn. If you own a lot of pink...now is the time for something purple! Great bonnet for baby's first pictures.

Size: Newborn

I can make this style bonnet in ivory, brown, beige, navy, sea foam, and charcoal.

Let me know if you have any questions

name: Somthing about Stripes
description:
This is a top selling hat in my shop! It's simple and super cute. It's hard to find a cute boy hat. This one is perfect!

Size: 13-14 inches around

Care: Hand wash in cold, lay flat to dry

name: Mini Mat With a touch of Pink and Polka Dot Halo
description:
Another new mini mat! This one has a touch of pink! I love it...and it comes with the cute polka dot halo! This little number is perfect for layering under a sweet baby girl.  I also have this mini mat for a boy with a touch of blue. 
This mini blanket measures approximately 13" by 15". It was made using a beautiful handspun yarn.

Let me know if you have any questions!

name: Mini Mat in Chestnut
description:
Love this color!!! It's perfect for baby boy or baby girl.  This little mini blanket measures 13" by 16". It has been made using a beatufiul soft handspun yarn. It's loosely knitted and perfect for layering! 

Thanks for stopping by!

name: Mini Mat in Blue, Ivory, and Brown
description:
This is a new fun prop in the shop. It is sure to add that little something extra to your newborn photo. This mini mat was made using handspun yarn. It's approximately 13" by 15".

Care: Hand wash only in cold, making sure not to agitate the yarn. Lay flat to dry. 

Thanks for looking!

name: Little Bow Tie Back Halo Headband
description: This is a new little tie back available in the shop. I only have a few in number, so snatch yours up. It's adds the perfect pop of color in your newborn photos.

name: Mini Mat in Gray with Tie Back Bow
description:
This is a new set in the shop. The Mini Mat was made using the softestof handspun yarns. It's small in size approx. 12" by 15". The Tie back bow adds the perfect pop of color for a pretty picture.  

Newborn in size
Gently hand wash this item. If the yarn is aggitated too much the yarn will begin to felt.  

If you are interested in just the mini mat contact me the price for the mini mat is $39.00

These items are intended to be used for newborn photography. Please let me know if you have any questions.

Thanks for taking a look.

name: Soft and Delicate Bonnet with flower
description:
This is new to the shop. This little bonnet was made using a high end mohair type yarn. The color I used for this particular bonnet is a pretty seafoam green/turquoise color. I attached a cute flower and lace embellishment just to add that little something extra. The flower/lace embellishment has been attached to a clip so that it can be removed or placed anywhere on the bonnet.

Size: Newborn 

Care: Handwash in cold only. Lay flat to dry.

This hat is best used for photography purposes. 
Thanks for stopping by my shop!

name: Soft and Delicate Bonnet Newborn Photography Prop
description:
This is new to the shop! I love it! It's perfect for your next shoot. What makes it so great, is that you can use it for baby boy or baby girl. 

Size: Newborn (baby pictured is 1 week old)

Care: hand wash only, lay flat to dry

name: Cable Guy with Tassels newborn prop
description:
This hat is oozing cuteness! The yarn used in this hat is super soft. This beanie has a cable stitch down the front. I can make this hat in other colors such as: sea foam, ivory, brown, sand, and charcoal.

Size: Newborn (13"-14")

Care: Hand wash only, lay flat to dry.

Thanks for looking! Let me know if you have any questions!

name: Bear Cub Set Photography Prop
description:
This is new to the shop. This is a great set because it is gender neutral. When you purchase this item, you will get the bear cub cable hat and the knitty pants.  This yarn is so very soft. Baby will be so cozy and cute for his or her fist photo shoot!

I can make this in brown, and gray too.

Care: Hand wash only, lay flat to dry.

Product Photography by 
http://www.kyleighsuephotography.com/#
and last photo by
www.tonielmer.com

name: Sweetie
description:
You might just need this little hat in your collection. It's perfect! Simple, cute, and one of a kind. This yarn is a sand/beige coloring with a hint of gray in some lights.  This hat has been embellished with a fabric bow that has been sewn onto the front. 

Size: 13-14 in. around

Care: Hand wash in cold only. Lay flat to dry.

name: Lovely in Lavender
description:
This lil' bonnet is new to the shop. The color of this yarn is kind of muted purple. This yarn is a lace type yarn. It's thin and delicate in nature.  So very cute! It's perfect for your little lady's first photo shoot :)

I can make this bonnet in light gray, ivory, and even teal.
 
Size: Newborn (for babies with 13"-14" heads). 

Care: Hand wash in cold only. Lay flat to dry.

name: Tiny Flowers Halo
description:
If you looking for a unique headband... look no further. This may be the one for you. It has been embellished with 2 little flowers. The colors are perfect for fall! This little halo would make for a beautiful photo of your little lady! 
This headband is super easy to use. You just tie it in a bow at the back of baby's head. 

Size: Newborn 

**This headband contains small parts. Do Not leave baby unattended while in use.

name: Angel Baby Bonnet in Pink
description:
This lil' bonnet is new to the shop. The color of this yarn is a soft pink color. This yarn is a high-end lace mohair yarn. It's delicate in nature.  So very cute! It's perfect for your little lady's first photo shoot :)

I can make this bonnet in lavendar and in a light beige ecru color.
 
Size: Newborn (for babies with 13"-14" heads). It's best used on babies 2 weeks and under.

Care: Hand wash in cold only. Lay flat to dry.

name: Something about a Cable
description:
The simplest of beanies can be made extra special with a cable stitch. The cable gives it that little something extra. 

This hat was knitted with a nice sand/ oatmeal colored yarn. The yarn can take on a grayish tint in some lights. 

Size: Newborn. (13-14 inches around)

Care: Hand wash only, lay flat to dry.

Thanks for looking!

Product Photography by Becky Hill with
www.capturedwithcarphotography.com

name: Snow White Floppy Top
description:
Here is a unique little pixie hat. It's ivory/cream with little flecks of pink! It's cute and unique. It's perfect for baby girl's first photo shoot!

Size: Newborn (13-14 inches around)

Care: Handwash only. Lay flat to dry.

Thanks for looking!

name: Pretty in Plum
description:
Just in case you don't need another pink hat....try something PURPLE. This is a new hat in the shop. The color of this hat is actuallyy a deep purple/plum color. The little bow has been sewn onto the hat. The edges of the bow have been burned to help prevent fraying. Perfect for newborn photos. 

Size: Newborn (13-14 in.)

Care: Hand wash only, lay flat to dry

Thanks for looking!

Photography by Summer with www.summerlynphotography.com

name: Pretty Lil' Halo in Yellow
description:
If you looking for a unique headband... look no further. This may be the one for you. It has been embellished with lace, flowers and a little bead. It's perfect for your little lady's first photo shoot. 
This headband is super easy to use. You just tie it in a bow at the back of baby's head. 

Size: Newborn 

**This headband contains small parts. Do Not leave baby unattended while in use.

name: Pretty Lil' Halo in Pink
description:
If you looking for a unique headband... look no further. This may be the one for you.  It's perfect for your little lady's first photo shoot. 
This headband is super easy to use. You just tie it in a bow at the back of baby's head. 

Size: Newborn 

**This headband contains small parts. Do Not leave baby unattended while in use.

name: Pretty Lil' Thing in Teal
description:
If you looking for a unique headband... look no further. This may be the one for you. It has been embellished with lace, fabric, and a little bead.It's perfect for your little lady's first photo shoot. 
This headband is super easy to use. You just tie it in a bow at the back of baby's head. 

Size: Newborn 

**This headband contains small parts. Do Not leave baby unattended while in use.

name: Pretty Lil' Thing Halo
description:
If you looking for a unique headband... look no further. This may be the one for you. It has been embellished with lace, ruffles and a little bead. It's perfect for your little lady's first photo shoot. 
This headband is super easy to use. You just tie it in a bow at the back of baby's head. 

Size: Newborn 

**This headband contains small parts. Do Not leave baby unattended while in use.

name: Bonnet
description:
This lil' bonnet is new to the shop. The color of this yarn is a biscuit/ecru color. I have hand stitched a piece of lace along the edge of the bonnet. The lace is also used as ties for the bonnet. So very cute! It's perfect for your little lady's first photo shoot :)

I can make this bonnet a few additional colors: brown, light gray, beige, and light pink. Let me know if you would prefer a different color.

Size: Newborn (for babies with 13"-14" heads)

Care: Hand wash in cold only. Lay flat to dry.

name: Bit of Plaid
description:
If you are having a hard time finding a cute hat for baby boy, look not further. This may be the hat you are looking for. This hat is made using a nice shade of brown, and the yarn is super soft. I have sewn on a little tab of plaid fabric to give it something different and unique. The button has been sewn onto the tab. It's perfect for your little man's first photo shoot.

Size: Newborn (13-14 inches around)

Care: Hand wash only, lay flat to dry.

This hat contains small parts. Don't leave baby unattended while in use.

name: Lil' Halo in Pink
description:
Simplicity at it's best! I love this sweet pink headband. This is a great additional to any newborn photograph. 

This headband is great because you tie it in the back of the baby's head. This allows it to fit mulitple baby head sizes.

Thanks for looking!

name: Little Button Topper
description:
This Lil' button Topper is one of my best selling hats. I Love this boyish hat! I created a little flap around the brim of this hat that easily buttons over to the side. I love the simplistic nature of this unique and very cute hat. The little brown button adds the perfect touch. 

Size: Newborn (13-14 inches)

Care: For best results, hand wash, lay flat to dry.

Thanks for looking!

*This hat contains small parts. Don't leave baby unattended while in use.

name: All Wrapped Up
description:
This is a perfect wrap for newborn photo shoots. The material is soft and easy to use. The edges are unfinished which gives this wrap a unique frayed look. The color is great for baby boys and girls

Size:  20 inches by 30 inches

Care: Hand wash only

name: Touch of Lace
description:
Here is my touch of lace hat in Pink! I love all things lace. This beanie has been embellished with a little touch of lace. The off-white lace bow adds the perfect feminine touch to this already pretty hat! Perfect for newborn photos!

The lace bow has been hand sewn onto the hat. If you prefer, I can put it on an alligator clip so that it can be removable. 

Size: newborn (measures 13-14 inches around) 

Care: Handwash in cold, lay flat to dry.

Thanks for looking!

name: Floppy top in Blue and White
description:
Perfectly soft and floppy for a sleepy newborn! This little stocking cap was made using some a nice thick blue and ivory colored yarn. It's perfect for baby boys first photo shoot

Size: Newborn
